page.title: 18Language spoken in Glanaman.
page.content: Glanaman is a traditionally Welsh area; Welsh has been the language spoken on the streets and in the homes for many generations. However, increasingly, the younger people are tending to make English the medium for their everyday conversations. There has been an influx of English speaking families into the area and despite the school's bilingual approach to education, children tend to speak English when one of their number is unable to speak Welsh. In addition, the television set is a very powerful linguistic force in modern life and although there are Welsh programmes available, the vast majority of programmes watched by the local community are in English.
